items.name: Contact Information
items.remark: Note: all information provided throughout this sequence should describe the situation as of the date of completion. Future policy initiatives should be listed under Section 9 - Future plans.
By "adding" new fields, you will automatically import references entered in previous years. If field is empty, please complete it with relevant reference.

items.text: Please provide the name and contact details of the person(s) who is the point of contact for this sequence.
